definition: to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: The book was out of print, but I eventually ran it to earth at a secondhand bookshop.
sentences.chinese: 那本书已经绝版，但我终于在一家旧书店淘到了它。

sentences.english: At (long) last we found out what had really happened.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我们终于弄清了实际发生的情况。

sentences.english: Also, we can finally turn the spotlights off.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我们也终于能关上那盏聚光灯了。

sentences.english: Professional athletes were fully embraced, finally ending the tradition of amateurism at the games.
sentences.chinese: 专业运动员被完全接受，终于在比赛结束的业余传统。

sentences.english: My father and mother, now together.
sentences.chinese: 我的阿爸，和阿妈，现在终于在一起了。

sentences.english: Sleeping at last in a dreamless sleep locked fast.
sentences.chinese: 终于在无梦的睡眠中睡得香。

sentences.english: In the end, the workers became used to doing hard work.
sentences.chinese: 最后，工人们终于习惯于干苦活了。

sentences.english: After years of Ross mooning over Rachel, she finally found out that he was in love with her.
sentences.chinese: 在罗斯暗恋瑞秋多年后，这个傻丫头终于发现了。

sentences.english: However, due to excessive blood loss, he finally can not support.
sentences.chinese: 但是由于失血过多，他终于支撑不下去了。

sentences.english: In the moment and again the flash across is that girl's face, Qiong's eventually preoccupied of her is who.
sentences.chinese: 眼前再次闪过那个女孩的脸，琼终于想起了她是谁。

sentences.english: His heart was finally stirred by her remarks.
sentences.chinese: 他终于被她的话打动了心。

sentences.english: I followed this kitty all around the places, and finally got this lovely shot.
sentences.chinese: 我追著它绕来绕去，最后终于等到这张可爱的照片。

sentences.english: The old clock finally wore out.
sentences.chinese: 这只旧钟终于不能再用了。

sentences.english: Othello loves his wife Desdemona, but throttles her mercilessly.
sentences.chinese: 奥塞罗爱妻子但却残忍地扼死了妻子并终于自杀。

sentences.english: After eight years of fighting, the Chinese people at lastdefeated the Japanese invaders.
sentences.chinese: 经过八年浴血奋战，中国人民终于打败了日本侵略者。

definition: ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
to wish for the stars and the moon/to have unreal expectations
pinyin: pan4 xing1 xing1 pan4 yue4 liang4

definition: (once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
